resources.string: Max retry count for reliable message
Expected response count for reliable message
No bluetooth device found, enable location and retry?

1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkBleMesh directory

 2. Copy json file to phone[2]'s sdcard

 3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage

 4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect

string-array.name: share_flow
string-array.item: 1. On phone[1] click [EXPORT] to export storage as json file to sdcard/TelinkBleMesh directory
2. Copy json file to phone[2]\'s sdcard
3. Click [select file] to select json file , then click [IMPORT] to load json file and sync storage
4. Back to home page, and waiting for mesh reconnect

resources.string: Enabled for scanning , provisioning and key-binding one by one; Disabled for selectable networking.
Enabled for scanning , provisioning and key-binding one by one; Disabled for selectable networking.
Enabled for scanning , provisioning and key-binding one by one; Disabled for selectable networking.
TIP: Enabled for default bound when key-binding;
Enabled for default bound when key-binding;

Database file should be formatted as:
 [uuid0] [oob0]
 [uuid1] [oob1]
 [uuid2] [oob2]
 \.\.\.

 (uuid and oob array length should be 16)
Use No-OOB if device UUID not found when device is static-OOB supported
Use No-OOB if device UUID not found when device is static-OOB supported

DLE selected action will change mesh upper layer segmentation bound: 

	Disabled -> segment bound is 11; 

	Enabled -> segment bound is 225. 


See [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_DEFAULT] and [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_LONG] in [NetworkingController].

DLE selected action will change mesh upper layer segmentation bound: 

	Disabled -> segment bound is 11; 

	Enabled -> segment bound is 225. 


See [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_DEFAULT] and [UNSEGMENTED_ACCESS_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH_LONG] in [NetworkingController].
Telink private provision profile, scan and setting device by direct connected mesh device.
1.Select at least one network key \n2.Select destination\n3.Click EXPORT
1.Select source \n2.If the selected source is JSON file, select the target file \n3.Click IMPORT

1. No Extend: No extension is used. 

 2. Extend GATT Only: Only GATT (Generic Attribute Profile) is used for extending the bearer. 

 3. Extend GATT & ADV: Both GATT and advertising are used for extending the bearer.

1. Manual Switch(Default): Switch mesh network by manual. 

 2. Auto Switch: Switch mesh network automatically after import comple.

When the switch is on:
 	1. turned off gatt proxy by sent Gatt Proxy Set Message (gattProxy=0)
 	2. turned on private beacon by sent Private Gatt Proxy Set Message (privateGattProxy=1)
 Otherwise, the value in message is reversed (gattProxy=1, privateGattProxy=0)

When the switch is on:
 	1. turned off node identity by sent Node Identity Set Message (identity=0)
 	2. turned on private node identity by sent Private Node Identity Set Message (privateIdentity=1)
 Otherwise, the value in message is reversed (identity=1, privateIdentity=0)

When the switch is on:
 	1. turned off beacon by sent Beacon Set Message (beacon=0)
 	2. turned on private beacon by sent Private Beacon Set Message (privateBeacon=0)
 Otherwise, the value in message is reversed (beacon=1, privateBeacon=0)
